title: 113_s2481
content: The "Women's Small Business Procurement Parity Act" allows sole source contracts for small businesses owned and controlled by women. The "Women's Small Business Procurement Parity Act" amends Section 8(m) of the Small Business Act to allow sole source contracts for economically disadvantaged small business concerns owned and controlled by women in underrepresented industries. The "Women's Small Business Procurement Parity Act" allows sole source contracts for small business concerns owned and controlled by women in underrepresented industries, with specific criteria to be met for contract opportunities. The "Women's Small Business Procurement Parity Act" allows sole source contracts for small business concerns owned and controlled by women in underrepresented industries, based on fair and reasonable pricing and contractor responsibility criteria. The "Women's Small Business Procurement Parity Act" enables sole source contracts for small businesses owned and controlled by women, with specific contract price limits and contractor responsibility requirements. The Act also includes reporting requirements for goals related to these contracts. The Small Business Act is amended to allow sole source contracts for women-owned businesses and accelerates the deadline for reporting on underrepresented industries.
